TopicTitle: Camera not zooming in towards ship in orbit.

Articles.Content:
I launched a ship into orbit and decoupled a lander and re-docked it, flew to minus. Undocked to lander, and now the camera wont zoom in properly towards the lander. It's like 50m off. The other part of the ship is working fine.

I tried switching ship, restarting the game, using the "control from here" button, getting a kerbal in and out, nothing seems to work.

Has anyone else had this problem?

The camera system is very weird, especially compared to KSP1. Have you really tried all camera angles (chase is usually the best with "V") and the rest with "Home"?

Also, try your num-table. The num-arrows seem to be hard-wired to the camera, too, which is annoying when using these for flying as a lefty.
